summary:
Dutch senior executive with years of experience in the international chemical, food, bank/insurance and retail industry. Proven track record in development and implementation of HR policies on a global scale and an excellent track record of delivery.
Board Member of numerous subsidiary companies during career. Authentic professional, results orientated, soft on the inter-personal process, hard on the delivery commitment. Empathetic, moves easily from boardroom to shop floor, pragmatic and no nonsense. Discretion and Business Ethics, Dual Focus and Strategic & Team Orientation. Always focused on connecting and bridging people and departments. Able to build HR strategy, translate into practical systems and deliver at an operational level. Recognized as a strong, trustworthy people manager.

Specialties: Experiences
Management Development, M&A with focus on HR, strategy development and execution, organizational development, redesign and change, long term resources and talent management planning. 
Furthermore I developed a deep knowledge in Employment/labour law and worked on a high level with works counsels and unions.

profile_positions.description:
Management consulting and HR Consultancy
Several interim assignments in the field of all-round HRM from strategy to implementation, change management and management buy-out.
Currently restructuring business and HR in a retail company in South of the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Founder / Owner

profile_positions.description:
Inspectrum is a Dutch engineers and consultancy firm based in Velp. For 6 months I restructured the organization and solved the misfit with staff. 
Manages the human resources function by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, coaching, counseling, and disciplining staff; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing staff job contributions; maintaining compensation; determining production, productivity, quality; resolving problems; implementing change.
profile_positions.title: HR Manger

profile_positions.description:
Based in Utrecht lead an established the Dutch HR team (7 direct reports). In a matrix structure fully support the international HR community to achieve their HR-business objectives. Execute the negotiation process for the next Collective Labour Agreement. Designed and execute a Leadership performance training.
The HR organization evolving, task is to continue to sponsor the global HR model and act as a change agent. Support and develop the local and regional European talent management as “talent assets” to the wider organization over time, give talent exposure to other countries / projects. Create a platform and share HR best practice in the region.
profile_positions.title: Head of HR

profile_positions.description:
Based in Venlo I have the overall responsibility for the Human Resources function reporting directly to the Senior VP for the Benelux, Germany. Austria and Switzerland.
I am responsible for planning, designing, and executing HR services and programs that are aligned with functional business strategies.  Designed and implemented an new HR service delivery model. Supported the over-all business transformation into an new operation business model.

Achievements 
Lead the development and implementation of the new service delivery model for HR. Developed the Human Resources strategic plan and shorter-term plans and initiatives to support the business strategies and promote a unified company culture.
Manage the common processes and day-to-day operations of Human Resources, including both corporate Human Resources functions and deployed Human Resources support for the branches and region. 
Developed and implement a succession planning process for key positions throughout the company. Provide leadership to the HR team and build organizational capability and effectiveness.  Ensure a strong focus on internal customer satisfaction.
Identify gaps in training programs and develop programs that meet the needs of management and employees.
Supported from an HR perspective the transition into the new operating business model.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Director Human Resources (a.i.)

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to the CEO of Insurance International, I was accountable for the global business-partnering role in an almost continuously changing structure. Direct support to the International Op’s Director's/MD’s. 
I guide and manage the overall provision of Human Resources services, policies, and programs for the 
entire International Insurance group. 

Achievements  
Set up from scratch an new International HR Team (9 European and 5 Asiatic countries). 
With my team we developed and execute International HR strategies and policies. As member of the
global M&A team I’m responsible for the HR due diligence and leading the HR-integration processes of 
the new markets. Developed and launched the company’s performance management system ensuring a
direct link with its Core Values, role clarity and goals at the individual, business unit and corporate levels.
In a strongly growing business portfolio I’ll selected an global expat group and prepared staff members to work in various international operations overseas and in a multicultural environment. Significantly
improved the target-setting methodology and established a strong global HR-relationships. 
Targets include – design and execution of strategic HR plan, development of the reward policies, delivery of talent and MD plans.	Managed various separation projects and downsizing after the perdition of Fortis.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Director

profile_positions.description:
Invited by the Group Director for the Netherlands to review and support the development of the HR transformation in the Netherlands. To manage and develop in a regional role the HR support service function in the Netherlands to enable it, to achieve its vision and ambitious, an to deliver high quality HRM.

Achievements 
Delivered an HR strategic review document, making recommendations on new HR policies and organizational opportunities. Developed HR education and training programs and mentoring /coaching programs. Delivered documents on organizational design & change, performance management, remuneration, compensation and benefits, health and safety and employee relations. 
From an HR perspective involved entirely in the implementation of the lean and six sigma principles. Significantly increased productivity by introducing a performance management system that recognized contribution challenged staff to accept responsibility and empowered them to make decisions. Delivered “thought leadership” work as requested to stimulate thinking e.g. developing a HR voice on platforms, post platform organizational design, new job roles etc.
profile_positions.title: HR Executive

profile_positions.description:
As the HR Director, I was responsible for providing an outstanding HR service to the production facility in Ede de (Netherlands). I enjoyed working closely with the business and could support them with my team on all HR related matters. Under tremendous difficult circumstances we try to survive in a competitive environment. 

Achievements
Targets included, to develop clear HR strategies; establish realistic plans	and budgets; to achieve
improved business performance, and service delivery. Reduced employee turnover by 50% by increasing salary levels and introducing performance based incentives. Restructured and slimed down the organization by halve. Established a strategic HR change program and change organization to equip the business for the future. In the meantime, we support management to increase cost savings and further reduction on staff expenses.
This all with a strong focus on employee relations, works counsel and unions. After the restructuring and reorganization we unfortunately had to close the complete factory by the end of 2002.
profile_positions.title: HR Director
